      • readFile

        public static byte[] readFile(@NotNull
                              @NotNull String name)
                       throws IOException
        This method first looks for the file in the classpath. If this is not found it appends the suffix .gz and looks again in the classpath to see if it is present. If it is still not found it looks for the file on the file system. If it not found it appends the suffix .gz and looks again on the file system. If it still not found a FileNotFoundException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the file
        Returns:
        A byte[] containing the contents of the file
        Throws:
        IOException - FileNotFoundException thrown if file is not found
